## Teamwork Summary
Article: https://www.indeed.com/career-advice/career-development/good-teamwork 

# Characteristics of good teamwork
Communication is really important in teamwork. 
*How to communicate better*
- Use face-to-face communication
- Listen
- Make eye contact
- Be present and engaged
- Participate in the conversation


# Tips for developing good teamwork:
- Do team-building activities
- Encourage open dialogue
- Request anonymous feedback
